typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movieSource
movieSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottonTomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('fixed', 3,
		toInteger(year)<1960,
		toInteger(year)>=1960&&toInteger(year)<1990,
		toInteger(year)>=1990
	)) ~> movieSink
